name: Vincci Seleccion Posada del Patio

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed January 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We stayed here four nights last week (till 6 January 2012) and were very pleased with the hotel which is modern and clean. It is located within a short walk of the central station which is only four stops from the airport. So getting in and out of Malaga is quick and easy.
reviews.title: Excellent four star hotel for reasonable price

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed May 2011
reviews.text: Christina at reception was very helpful, with great suggestions for tapas, and restaurants.
reviews.title: If you find a promo, go!

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed August 2011, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: The room was spacious, well appointed and quiet. The staff ensured our room was kept clean and tidy and well supplied with clean towel and toiletries. We also liked the welcome drink on arrival.
reviews.title: Very Good, pleasant stay, but not quite 5 star

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed December 2011, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: It was too cold to swim in the roof top pool but we were not the only ones to soak up the warm winter sun on the deck.
reviews.title: Great decor, good service and nice food.

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed December 2011
reviews.text: Breakfast was good, but most often we sufficed with simpler fare from a local bakery.
reviews.title: Good price

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed December 2011, traveled with family
reviews.text: This Hotel was a real find, in the heart of Malaga City, a short walk from the Cathedral and the lovely pedestrianised shopping areas, 20 walkable distance from the port, the harbour and the beach.
reviews.title: 5 star service from the staff at this hotel.

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed November 2011, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: The staff were excellent and couldn't have been more helpful, and the hotel was perfect throughout. We were able to pay extra for a late checkout until 4pm and this was good value for money.
reviews.title: Really good hotel, great staff.

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed November 2011, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: My daughter enjoyed the chocolate fountain at breakfast, and we would definitely return to this hotel. On a minor note the rooftop pool is small with very little room for sunbathing, but stunning to stand there and see the floodlit city at night.
reviews.title: wonderfull

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed November 2011, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We arrived after a cruise, so got to the hotel very early in the morning i.e. 09.30. The girl at the check-in was very pleasant and efficient. We decided to upgrade for an extra 20 euros, and the room was available immediately, which meant we could unpack and change.
reviews.title: Lovely Hotel but inflexible with deals

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed November 2011, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Large, clean room with good-sized bathroom and we were on the top floor with a view of the pool and Malaga rooftops. There was a slight problem as some water from the shower ran into the bathroom rather than draining into the shower basin, and there's not much wardrobe space, but apart from that the room was great.
reviews.title: Weekend in Malaga

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed February 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: It’s a very modern hotel but sterile, I don’t always mind that. It is not a five star hotel for sure they don’t have the staff facilities etc. An example was when I arrived at the hotel I confirmed a price with a taxi driver at the airpor when I arrived at the hotel he decided to follow me in the hotel to tell reception that he wanted more money. I told the reception to tell him to go away they did not know how to handle this, in the USA they would not make it pass the door. I hate airport taxi drivers worldwide and always have this problem but expect 5 star hotels to deal with this.
reviews.title: Not 5 star

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed September 2011, traveled with friends
reviews.text: Any way we had a suite on 2 floors which was very big and with Hermes toiletries although they did not want to replace them daily. I had to argue for this to happen. Rooms were not cleaned great a basic standard when I pay reasonable money I expect it cleaned well. The breakfast was very good though I also felt very safe as a lady being there half a week alone. I think the problem was the staff.. there was one guy at reception with glasses who spoke brilliant English was very friendly and helpful but when he left it went downhill. The was no concierge no doorman at the door no bell boy or butler so can’t be 5 star maybe Spanish 5 star. They had a pool but was so small it was a joke. It was very central to Malaga town 2 minutes and 15 minutes to the beach waking. I would say it was a nice hotel but lacked the va va vroom of a 5 star. It’s good for location and for European standards Ok but I am used to America and UAE so no comparison..Even when I left they did not help me with a taxi i had to try and get one from outside which was a joke.. When I pay I ask I get i dont expect to argue for what I pay for !!
reviews.title: Really great!!

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed January 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: I loved this hotel. Really friendly staff, nice room, really central, great pool. I will definitely come back here.
reviews.title: Brilliant hotel in the centre of Malaga!

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed January 2012
reviews.text: My girlfriend and I had a nights stay in this hotel and it was great. The staff were very polite and helpful, the rooms were lovely and the whole hotel was very clean and modern. The had live music at the bar which was great, and there are plenty of places to eat, drink and shop just minutes walk away from the hotel. I would recommend this hotel to anyone!
reviews.title: Home from home.

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed January 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Will be staying again in the future , we went last summer during peak busy and could not fault it, this time we stayed in a suit as we had 7 year son with us and we didn't want to leave, good value with fantastic all you can eat buffet breakfast. And as for noise from the street non double double glazing. Go and check it out.
reviews.title: Try this hotel in Malga!

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed October 2011, traveled with family
reviews.text: The hotel was beautiful with wonderful, friendly service. Although the rooms were on the small side, they were modern, very nicely furnished and very clean The bathroom was particularly beautiful as well as large and luxurious. The hotel was within 5 minutes walking distance to restaurants and sites. Loved this hotel and would return if I visit Malaga again.
reviews.title: Beautiful, Great Location

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed October 2011, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Malaga in the driving rain was made bearable in part by our stay at the Posada del Patio.
reviews.title: Good location, helpful staff & spacious modern room

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed July 2011, traveled with friends
reviews.text: Staff were helpful providing information and making restaurant bookings and providing umbrellas!
reviews.title: Modern Hotel but with flaws

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed September 2011, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: A special mention for Younes on the front desk who had done his very best to get us tickets to see Malaga vs Real as well as providing us with local information.
reviews.title: Excellent hotel yo visit Malaga

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed October 2011
reviews.text: It was a pleasure to stay in a 5 star hotel where the service was more personal and less corporate than the usual 5 star 'american corporate' hotels.
reviews.title: Delightful staff,great comfort and central location

aka: Vincci Seleccion Posada Del Patio Hotel
